entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BinaryWriter breaking change #107265
  • After upgrading to .NET 9, simple C# statement triggers fatal error in Visual Studio 2022 when Control-C is used to exit #107263
    10.0.0
  • Proposer #if #else statement does not work with attributes #107262
  • [Optimization] BufferedFileStreamStrategy creates buffer, but can use ArrayPool<byte>.Shared #107260
  • `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorSpanTests.TensorExtensionsTwoSpanInFloatOut` fails with `IndexOutOfRangeException` #107254
  • [mono][ios] iOS device and simulator have different behavior deserializing an empty XML tag to a collection in .NET8 #107252
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Use user-provided `IDictionary<TK, TV>` instance in `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Xml.XmlConfigurationProvider` #107251
    Future
  • JIT: Intrinsics does not use address arithmetic #107250
  • ConfigurationBinder ignores [ConfigurationKeyName] on derived type #107247
    10.0.0
  • iOS-sim PhysicalFileProviderTests.TokenForEmptyFilter test failure #107246
  • Is possible to attach running process which single-file published, with the Visual Studio debugger? #107245
  • [mono] Mobile failures in TensorExtensionsTwoSpanInSpanOut #107244
  • [API Proposal]: Dictionary<T,V> when TryGetValue false support set the default value or Fun/Action to return? #107243
  • Reverting OS snapshot results in improper cleaning of dot net #107242
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.UseWindowsServiceTests.CanCreateService #107240
  • Test failure: System.Transactions.Tests.AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTAsyncTSNestedAsync #107239

Closed

  • New Rules for `Lock` class usage and to avoid public usage of `lock (this)` #106907
    10.0.0
  • TCP Socket Disconnected After Cancelling ReadAsync #107209
  • Test failure: System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorSpanTests.TensorExtensionsTwoSpanInFloatOut<Single>(tensorPrimitivesOperation: TensorPrimitivesTwoSpanInTOut`1 { Method = Single Distance(System.ReadOnlySpan`1[System.Single], System.ReadOnlySpan`1[System.Single]), Target = null }, tensorOperation: TensorTwoSpanInTOut`1 { Method = Single Distance[Single](System.Numerics.Tensors.ReadOnlyTensorSpan`1[System.Single] ByRef, System.Numerics.Tensors.ReadOnlyTensorSpan`1[System.Single] ByRef), Target = null }) #107238
  • Chrome update action is failing #107125
    10.0.0
  • [docs] Typed HttpClient configuration is lost when a service is registered a second time #101884
    9.0.0
  • [docs] Typed client registration issue #96308
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Illegal instruction generated by JIT for `Avx512BW.VL.CompareLessThan` #107146
    9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Issue with `AcceptInboundStreamAsync()` Hanging and Failing to Accept Inbound Streams #106938
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tvos] Libraries tests failed to build on Helix due to missing `System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.*` files #107029
    9.0.0
  • Idle thread timeout rules for thread pools #107017
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix string case-insensitive comparisons in Globalization invariant mode #107268
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Fix meter/instrument filtering in MetricsEventSource #107267
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Fixing System.Array constructor #107266
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix stack overflow reporting with multiple PALs #107264
    area-PAL-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.113, windows: 128.0.6613.86 #107259
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve AssemblyNameInfo Fuzzer #107257
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, test-enhancement
  • Fix LDR/STR->LDP/STP peephole with SP-based addressing #107255
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasi][Windows] SingleFilebundle project with long path results in linking error #107253
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [release/9.0] Fix encoding for certain k-mask instructions #107249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consolidate log for reliability framework #107248
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix IPGlobalProperties.DomainName to return string.Empty when domain name is not set #107241
    area-System.Net, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add TypeNameFuzzer #107206
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix sbyte overflow in TypeName parsing #107261
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

Updated

  • Fix calling property setter In in the Configuration source generator #107057
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm] more cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    area-Interop-mono
  • SuperPMI: ASPNET Collection job #106844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip more covariance checks #107116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve code coverage for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #107235
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • check in configurations #107012
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add FromFile to BinaryData #107231
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [TypeName] Nested types should respect MaxNode count #106334
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, binaryformatter-migration, 9.0.0
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [WASI] platform specific assemblies and fixes for testing #107196
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Use docker compose workaround from SslStress in HttpStress #107178
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Mono AOT] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #107198
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [WIP][mono] Try enable fullAOT-llvm arm64 CI jobs #106615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasi] Process LinkerArg for wasi #107194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Avoid crash if klass is null #107177
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid combining conditional select for reduction instrinsics #107207
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107225
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Include .NET version in templates package id #107182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [WASI][draft] UnsupportedOSPlatformAttribute on the API surface #107185
    api-needs-work, arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Add EventSource event method generation #107176
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Increase timeout for SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #107120
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Remove Helper Method Frames for Exception, GC and Thread methods #107218
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • global tools do not work #43171
  • Why there's no constructor defined for DateOnly and TimeOnly to take DateTime object as an input #43164

PullRequests

Created

  • Execute dotnet run behind the hood in dotnet test #43170
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Expose endpoint manifest type #43167
    untriaged
  • Allow roslyn binary into VMR #43162
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #43161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] Update aspnet #43169
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • VMR: Only copy TestResults if the folder exists #43116
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • We're currently copying the test assets to the publish directory #43146
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [StaticWebAssets] Improve Up to date check logic #43156
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #43144
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't translate command, per the note #43159

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Possible bug] Abstract explicit implementation of interface method #74975
  • `Use language keywords` does not work for `nint` and `nuint` when targeting `net4.8.1` using `LangVersion` 9.0 or higher #74973

Closed

  • CS8344 error even with C# 13 (ref in iterators/async) #74793
    17.12

PullRequests

Created

  • Emit generated inline array types without LayoutKind.Auto and with CompilerGeneratedAttribute #74972
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow ref enumerators in async/iterator methods #74800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, Next
  • Move to the real System.ValueTuple ref #74936
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Field-backed properties: support partial properties with auto-implemented accessors and with initializers #74959
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Put TArg before callbacks #74370
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: handle case with inline statement snippets before member access expression #74966
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add `Conversion.IsSpan` public API #74731
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Added handler for Razor Endpoint #74815
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, plaintext #57672
  • Using a Razor Component Library with TypeScript fails to copy assets #57662
  • 🐞 Hot Reload breaks CSS isolation when using a Razor class library #57660
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishaot #57658
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #57657
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapivanilla #57656
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #57655
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #57654
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #57653
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #57652
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #57651
  • OpaqueRedirection doesn't respect HTTP/HTTPS scheme behind a load balancer. #57650
  • ASP0019: Trailing trivia after IHeaderDictionary causes formatting issues with "Use indexer" code fix #57648

Closed

  • The `ScriptTagHelper` doesn't render the `type` attribute of the `<script>` tag when the target framework is .NET 9 #57664
  • Perf regression: plaintext_spring, single_query #57646
  • Misleading error when DI fails #57488

PullRequests

Created

  • [Static Assets] Improve development experience #57671
    area-blazor
  • HybridCache: relocate to dotnet/extensions #57670
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rc.2.24452.3 #57663
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #57659
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove trailing trivia from IHeaderDictionary in "Use indexer" code fix #57649
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-networking

Updated

  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • feat: extending `ApiBehaviorOptions` with skip `SkipStatusCodePages` #57597
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Fix duplicate error.type on kestrel.connection.duration #57581
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, 9.0-rc2
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet dump analyze threadpool fails to obtain threadpool data #4803
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid - Android - Keyboard covers UI despite having resize soft keyboard setting #24573
  • Input component is not getting focused on ChromeOS/Android Desktop when a user clicks on it #24572
  • [Android] `RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand` of `CarouselView` is not triggered #24571
  • [WinUI] `RefreshView` is not functional when wrapping a `CarouselView` #24570
  • MenuBarItem UI is not refreshing based on the IsEnabled property in Mac Catalyst #24569
  • Delayed Update of Navbar Title and TabBar Background Color in .NET MAUI on Android When Switching Tabs #24568
  • Android ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc2` #24566
    9.0-rc2

Closed

  • White or Black screen navigation on Android #13698
  • WebView on iOS causes UriFormatException: 'Invalid URI: The format of the URI could not be determined' #19161
  • Calendar Icon not shown in android phone. #24483
  • [Binding SG] It is not possible to use private fields and properties in SetBinding<TSource, TProperty> #23535
    9.0-rc2
  • El sdk microsoft.net.sdk especificado no se pudo encontrar #24297

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc.1] Update sdk rc1 #24574
  • [IOS] - Fix error when running new template maui app on iOS #24567
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for CollectionView single item horizontal alignment issue when using ItemsLayout with a Footer. #24564
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Refactor intercepted method verification #24514
    area-xaml
  • Show number of filtered tests in DeviceTests UI #24549
    area-testing

Updated

  • Navigation memory leak: Appearing event not being unsubscribed properly #24507
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • [Android & iOS] dialog theme change on changing UserAppTheme #24559
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-theme
  • [Android] invalidate shadows on parent's size change #24561
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/android
  • [iOS] Shadow for clipped visual element #23872
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Avoid recomputing bindings multiple times and bind BindingContext first #24553
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [X] Ignore Parent DataType on collection #24530
    area-xaml
  • fix ICanvas.ClipPath documentation #24560
    community ✨
  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers #24479
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Resolved Text Jump Issue in Entry Control with HorizontalTextAlignment Set to End #24485
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Fix for Scrolling of Editor placed in ScollView issue #24531
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [X] do not look for parent DataType on collections #24513
    area-xaml

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `IEntityType` is replaced by `ITypeBase` but I loose certain methods that I need for EfCore.SchemaCompare library #34594
  • Is there any possible to add a api when select page data by condition then return value and the total count? #34592
  • Provide the AddKeyedDbContext extension method on Services #34591
  • Sqlite - Functions are not executed or result to NULL on INSERT #34590

Closed

  • Cannot resolve symbol 'ToListAsync' #34599
  • Message 'The given key 'PlatformTarget' was not present in the dictionary.' when running 'dotnet ef' #34579
  • SQL Query Translation for !string.IsNullOrEmpty(MAPPED_DB_FIELD) Condition #34585

PullRequests

Created

  • Change analyzer references to use the standard/recommended form #34596

Merged

  • Various tweaks that came out of PG sync #34593

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34581
